name: ink (itch) (Becklespinax)
description:
I'm still challenging myself to make a game related project every month this year. I made this with the lovely adorable sok-stories.

A very simple self portrait about me and my tattoos.

I'm not feeling very inspired with my games at the moment, but that's because I'm busy with work and life and being happy and getting on with things, and not in my "which sad animal shall I make a game about this month?" zone. This is a good thing - I'm glad I've kept the project going as long as I have, and I intend to see out the year. Till next month!
